Sentencas: In this study, the A-site-deficient ABO(3) perovskites La0.9-xSr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta with x=0.025, 0.05, 0.075, 0.1, and 0.2 were prepared by conventional solid state reactions.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity

Sentencas: X-ray investigations were carried out in order to determine the influence of the A-site deficiencies on the structure.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity

Sentencas: The electrical conductivities were measured as a function of both temperature and oxygen partial pressure in ranges 500-1000 degreesC and 0.2-10(-6) atm, respectively.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity

Sentencas: Only for small x values were single phases obtained.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity

Sentencas: All compositions with A-site deficiencies exhibit a lower conductivity compared to the stoichiometric compound.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity

Sentencas: It is shown by SEM micrographs that the sample morphology is changed by an A-site-deficient preparation as well.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity

Sentencas: For A-site-deficient compositions, a reduction of the grain size is observed, most likely due to impurity inclusions in the grain boundaries.
Titulo: Influence of A-site deficiencies in the system La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ on structure and electrical conductivity
